Attempts to clear the majority of pointers from this experiment.

This is in hopes that the java garbage collection will free this memory when needed.

loadConditionsFromFile

public void loadConditionsFromFile(java.io.File condConfFile)
Loads conditions from a file.

All conditions are parsed from a conditions file, and using the values from the current experiment's configuration new conditions are created and placed into the Vector conditions. The pointers are then ordered according to shuffling, counterbalancing, etc., and then inserted into the List conditionsQueue, where they are run in the order of conditionsQueue. Note: this function should be called *after* the experiment configuration is set as it relies on values in the configuration.

Parameters:
condConfFile -

loadConditions

public void loadConditions()
Loads conditions from the preset conditions file.
